summary.p: 10 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 62; Qurʾānic Text: Q 4:23-4:59; 10 lines per page; Dimensions: 335 x 235mm; Script style: kūfī D.I.
The fragment Marcel 63 (NLR) belongs to the same manuscript.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
10 fol. 235×335 mm (1.43). Support: thin transparent parchment, rigid, of yellowish color. Writing material: black ink.
Collation: fragments of two quires, all sheets at present are single.
I: H1F H2F / F3H F4H F5H.
II: H6F H7F H8F H9F / F10H.

Text layout: 148/150×238/240 mm (1.6/1.666) или 145×240 mm (1.655), 10 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: D I, horizontal elements of letters are stretched. Diacritics: diagonal dashes in the same ink as the main text. Vocalization: red and green round dots.

Verse markers: for individual verses – diagonal dashes in the same ink as the main text (type 1.1.1); for groups of dive verses – golden letter ﻪ (hā); for groups of ten verses –medallions in the text line (type 2.A.II) in gold and colors, with the inscribed verse numbers signified by letters according to the abjad system (ل – fol. 4r, م – fol. 7r, ن – fol. 10r).
Inscriptions: numbers of surahs in Roman numerals and the verse numbers in Arabic numerals are inscribed in ink on the upper margin of all sheets; verse numbers are also marked in the text.
Traces of old conservation: fol. 8 is strengthened with glued strips of transparent paper.
Defects: margins of all sheets are strongly damaged, probably by rodents and fire, deteriorated with partial loss of text; traces of dirt and fungi; tears on fol. 2-4, 7 and 9.
Old accession numbers: (according to Langlois’ inventory).
Fol. 1r–10v. Surah 4, verses 27(23)–56(59). Incipit: [وخالاتكم وبنات] الاخ وبنات الاخت . Explicit: بآياتنا سوف [نصليهم ناراً] .
Other fragments of the same manuscript: Marcel 63 (NLR)."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
